meanings.sent1: The couple decided to seek nonmarital counseling to strengthen their relationship.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, nonmarital unions are not legally recognized.
meanings.sent3: The nonmarital wedding planner accidentally booked the same venue for two different couples!
meanings.sent4: Their nonmarital bond was as strong as any traditional marriage.
meanings.sent5: The nonmarital vows they exchanged were heartfelt and sincere.

meanings.definition: Not related to or connected with marriage
meanings.sent1: The siblings had a nonmarital dispute over who would inherit the family home.
meanings.sent2: The company policy prohibited nonmarital relationships between employees.
meanings.sent3: The nonmarital debate over the office coffee maker became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmarital connection to the company was purely professional.
meanings.sent5: The nonmarital agreement was signed and sealed without any complications.
